Chinese.name: 定时拨测函数
Chinese.description: 本示例主要演示定时拨测 URL 列表中的地址，当拨测失败时，通过邮件发送告警。
Chinese.attention: 可选择 CMQ Topic 事件模版进行模拟测试。

English.name: DialURLByTimer
English.description: This demo will dial url list by tmier trigger. If dial url fail, it will send email to email list
English.attention: CMQ Topic event template can be selected for simulation test.
